input: Error correction: At 6:27, the upper equation should have g/L instead of L/g.

translatedText: 如果您正在寻找有关此主题的书籍，我会推荐弗拉基米尔·阿诺德 (Vladimir Arnold) 所著的《常微分方程》
input: If you're looking for books on this topic, I'd recommend the one by Vladimir Arnold, "Ordinary Differential Equations"

translatedText: 另外，Strogatz 更有趣，你可能会喜欢他的文章《非线性动力学与混沌》
input: Also, more Strogatz fun, you may enjoy his text "Nonlinear Dynamics And Chaos"
